bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of chuang 瘡 , sores, conditions that develop on one’s cheeks. In the beginning they appear like rice grains. In extreme cases they fester and pierce through the cheeks. Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 132: 治大人小兒蝕透腮頰，初生如米豆，名金腮瘡 , “To cure erosions piercing through the cheeks of adults and children. In the beginning they appear like rice grains. They are called ‘ metal cheek sores ’”.
